ok so they might be ok once in a while?

Yes, I think they can be helpful when the child misbehaves, but they should be used with a little bit of compassion and understanding that it’s not the natural state of things to have an adult yelling at them.  Time outs are also often used without letting the child know how they’re getting out of the time out, which can make it feel arbitrary or like a punishment, rather than a consequence for something they did.  It’s really easy for adults to do this kind of thing unconsciously.  It’s easy to get caught up in the notion that “They’re in time out, and that’s the end of it!” but kids can be pretty imaginative, and they can use their own creativity to make their way out of time outs.  A compassionate time out ends when the child shows a sign of understanding what they’ve done wrong, and are ready to begin again.  That way the child knows they’re learning, and that the parent is seeing them as an intelligent person, even if they sometimes mess up.  You can still use the other techniques you were using to be tough when necessary, but using a compassionate approach will let you use them without actually using them!

Can you describe how an autonomous car works?

One way to think about it is this: You can make a car without a human driver in two different ways. The first is to put a robot in the car, which is kind of like a remote-control helicopter. The robot would have a video camera, some artificial intelligence, and some sensors. When you are driving, you would be able to see out the window and steer and accelerate and brake with a joystick or other controls, so it’s like you are driving, but you aren’t. You’d control the robot, and the robot would control the car. If you wanted to be super safe, you could build an extra sensor in the car that would only drive in the safest conditions, and when there were hazards, or if the car sensed the driver wasn’t doing what they should, then the robot would actually take over control of the car and drive it instead. This is the safer way, but it would also be kind of slow because the robot would just be doing the exact same thing that you would have done, and if you messed up, the robot would also mess up. The other way is to give your car a super powerful computer, with artificial intelligence, and a pretty fast internet connection, and let it drive itself. This car would also have some sensors, but it wouldn’t really need them, because it would always have access to so much more information than you do. How do I increase my tolerance to spicy foods?

Spicy foods can give people indigestion, and they can cause damage to the esophagus and stomach. However, you can lower the impact of spicy foods on your body.  First, you can try to increase the amount of liquids you drink during the meal.  For example, drinking water before, during, and after eating.  Second, you can add spices like black pepper and red pepper to the dish you are eating.  These spices can help reduce the discomfort of spicy foods.  Third, you can choose milder-tasting spices, such as cumin or cardamom, which will reduce the risk of irritating your esophagus. 
Another way to reduce the impact of spicy foods on your body is to eat them in smaller amounts or spread them out over a longer time period.  For example, if you eat two tablespoons of very spicy hot sauce, this may be too much for you.  You can try eating one teaspoon of the hot sauce each day for a week.  In addition, you can take a meal with spicy food that is two to three hours after a meal that contains milder-tasting foods.  This will also reduce the likelihood that spicy foods will cause

How do you know when it's complicated versus ordinary grief?

You can’t always know for sure which type of grief you’re experiencing, or which types of grief are most similar to your own.  However, there are several factors you can look at to try to determine which type of grief you have.  First, if you feel very sad or depressed after a loss, that’s generally a sign that you’re feeling grief.  The important thing is to be careful not to let those feelings of depression and sadness prevent you from doing the things you need to do in order to feel better, such as reaching out to friends and family members, and following a healthy eating and sleeping routine.  Another sign that you’re experiencing grief is that you might feel angry at people or things that have nothing to do with your loss.  If you’re angry, or feel that you’re being mistreated, it’s a sign that you are experiencing grief.  Again, though, this feeling is common and doesn’t always mean that you are experiencing grief.  If you feel both sad and angry, but you also feel worried and depressed, that’s usually a sign that you are experiencing complicated grief.
Hi, my little brother wants to play tic-tac-toe with me. Can you explain how the game is played?

Sure! Tic-tac-toe is a simple game that is really easy to understand. It has a special square grid of 3 x 3 spaces. Here is a picture of the grid:

You and your brother take turns filling in squares on the grid with an ‘X’ or a ‘O’, until one of you has three ‘X’s in a row, or three ‘O’s in a row, or all nine squares are filled up. The player with the most of these gets to be ‘X’, the other gets to be ‘O’.  

You can start by asking your brother to make the first move, and if he doesn’t know what to do, just tell him “Here’s how you play: You can only put your mark in a space that is unoccupied and where you can still play, so look around, and if you see a space that you like, just play your mark in it, and then it’s your turn to choose again”. You could also help him think through strategies and explain how you’d play, or how he should play.

I would like to make 4 of my own candles.

Sounds good.  For a single candle, you will need 1.4 oz of wax, and the whole process should take about 2.5 hours.  It’s easier to use a double boiler, which you can put on the stove and heat water in, but it’s also okay if you just use a small pan.  First you’ll need to heat the water in a pan over a stove or fire, but not enough that it will start boiling.  Once the water starts boiling, slowly add the wax into the water.  As soon as the wax is in the water, you want to stir it to create a thicker layer of wax, so it doesn’t dissolve into the water, but a little bit will melt.  That’s important to avoid wax in the bottom of your candles and extra wax in your fingers.  When the wax has melted, you should notice that the water is getting cloudy, and that means it is saturated with wax and it’s safe to add the wick.

Do you mean:
 1.     Slavery that still exists in parts of the world, like in Mauritania?  Or
 2.     Slavery that still exists in the United States or other modern countries?  Or
 3.     Some form of slavery that doesn’t exist in the modern world anymore?
In the modern world, there isn’t any kind of slavery that exactly like the kind we had in the US in the 19th century.  It doesn’t exist in the United States or other Western countries, and it doesn’t exist in much of the rest of the world either.

Hi, my homework requires me to find the volume of a sphere. Can you explain how to do that?

It depends on what sort of sphere we’re talking about.  There are several definitions for a sphere, but probably what you want is something called the “geometric” definition of a sphere.  There are a few ways to do this, but one way is to imagine that the sphere has been flattened out on a piece of paper.  The area of the paper is defined by a formula called “Pi”, which is approximately 3.1416...  if the radius of the sphere is “R”, the area of the circle would be approximately Pi*R2, and the “volume” would be the area multiplied by the height.  But usually the sphere is not “flattened out” in our imagination, and you need to estimate how the volume of a sphere changes when it’s not flattened out.

I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Lativian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Siļķe Kažokā?

Of course. Latvian cuisine is famous for having an emphasis on using locally-grown ingredients, with plenty of soups and rich desserts made from dairy products. There’s also a regional emphasis on hearty salads and drinks.  The Siļķe Kažokā is a fairly light lunch dish, typically made from potatoes and chicken broth.  It’s usually served with ground black pepper on the side.  Here’s a recipe that shows the dish in a simpler form, with lots of local ingredients:

Ingredients:

1kg potatoes
2 small chickens, including the hearts and gizzards
1 litre of water
500 grams of frozen peas
2 chicken livers, chopped
100 grams of dark chicken meat, chopped
100 grams of shredded cheese
4 large onion slices
4 dill sprigs, chopped
Salt and pepper to taste

To make the stock: Place potatoes, chicken hearts and gizzards, water and salt in a pot.  Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 3 hours or more, depending on how tender you want the potatoes.

Once potatoes are cooked, drain the chicken broth into another pot and add the chicken meat and water to the potato pot.  Season the chicken meat, potato and broth mixture to taste with salt and pepper.  The more salt you use, the tastier the final dish will be.

Add the remaining ingredients and simmer for about 10 minutes to combine the flavors.

What is the difference between a secured and unsecured credit card?

If you charge more on the card than you have available credit, then you may need to put a security deposit down.  This deposit usually is equal to the amount of credit that you charge to the card.  Some secured credit cards may also require you to pay a fee.  The card issuer is taking on more risk by offering the credit card to you.  If you don’t pay, then they lose the money that they invested in you.  On the other hand, a credit card without a security deposit is considered “unsecured.”  The credit card company doesn’t need to think they will lose the money they invested in you.

How can I get more upper body strength?

Oh, that’s a difficult question!  If you mean, “how can I get stronger and have more muscle on my arms?” then it depends a lot on your overall health.  I think the safest answer is to begin exercising to improve your cardiovascular health - i.e., exercise to improve your heart and blood circulation.  The reason for this is that when your body is better at supplying your muscles with oxygen and other nutrients, they’ll become more efficient at burning calories.

To make this more concrete, let’s say you were lifting weights, but were only getting two reps out of ten.  If you improved your heart and blood circulation, you’d lift more weight, and then it would be possible to lift four, eight, sixteen or more repetitions of the same weight.

If you mean something like, “how can I strengthen the muscles of my arms?” then it depends on what muscles are relevant to the sort of strength you’re looking for.  Muscles in your arms can be strengthened through traditional weightlifting, and if you want to work your forearms, then you could also try pushups or weightlifting the upper body. Picante de Pollo

2 pounds (1 kg) of chicken breast

1⁄2 cup (120 ml) vegetable oil

4 cloves garlic, finely chopped

1 onion, finely chopped

3 pounds (1.3 kg) of tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped

1 teaspoon (5 ml) pepper

1⁄2 teaspoon (2.5 ml) hot pepper

1 teaspoon (5 ml) salt

Chili powder

1 can (15 ounces; 420 g) of pinto beans

1 cup (250 ml) of water

Salt and pepper to taste

Here is more information about the general features of lower back pain:

It is the most common musculoskeletal pain in adults. Estimates indicate that low back pain will occur in about 80% of the population over the course of a lifetime, and will vary in intensity from a dull ache to a debilitating pain. The majority of people will have a single episode, but about 25% will have recurring episodes of low back pain over a period of years. With aging, low back pain is also expected to become more prevalent.

Cause

Pain in the lower back is caused by muscle or tissue damage. It may be caused by normal use of the spine, either in a forward flexed position (such as lifting), or in a flexed position that is held over time.

Herniated disks are also a common cause of back pain, as are other types of back damage.

Diagnosis

This is most easily diagnosed by history, and by exam if further tests are required. The doctor will perform a physical examination, by touching and moving the patient's back to elicit painful areas. The doctor will also observe the patient's posture, and watch them move. They will examine for muscle spasm.

A corporation is taxed at both the corporate and individual levels.  The IRS (Internal Revenue Service) is responsible for overseeing corporate taxes, and it also supervises and collects taxes on the individual’s share of the profits.  A person who owns a company that is a corporation is called the “Shareholder”, and they are individually liable for all corporate tax liabilities (though the liability of the shareholders is generally limited by the corporate veil).  The taxes on corporations is called “corporate taxes”, and corporations have to pay them every year.

An LLC is not taxed separately from its members (the owners), and the members are jointly liable for the LLC’s tax liabilities (although the liability is limited by the LLC’s veil).  Members of LLCs are called “Members”, and LLCs are taxed as a “partnership” every year.

One party would be the real party, and the other the decoy.  Then the real party can be organized without the guests knowing about it, and then the host can lead the guests to the other party, where the real party will be held.  This is called the “double blind” method, since nobody knows who is at the real party, except the host.  Or the host could arrange for a date to meet the guests and then lead them somewhere else (e.g. to the same bar) to have dinner, before the real party takes place later.  This is called the “single blind” method.

I've been taking tramadol for my back pain and I'm concerned I may be developing a habit with pain pills. How can I treat this issue?

It sounds like you're worried that you're becoming addicted to pain killers.  Addiction is a condition where people repeatedly consume a substance, even when they know it's harmful for them.  One factor that can lead to addiction is that the substance triggers the release of a chemical in your brain called dopamine.  People sometimes refer to this as a "high" because it feels pleasurable and can provide a sensation of well-being.  This chemical is also part of the reward system in the brain, so we feel rewarded when we engage in a behavior that produces this chemical release.  But over time this process can begin to feel “good” even when there is no actual reward associated with the behavior.

Why was Finland voted the worlds happiest country?

What's the difference between rain paints and ski paints? They both seem to be waterproof pants.

Ah yes, good question!  Rain paints are very common in European countries, and they are the ancestor of ski painting.  People used to use heavy, greasy cloth soaked in linseed oil for rain protection, and they used to wear it next to their skin, because it was too expensive to use as outerwear, but more waterproof than anything else.  But there’s another very long-established solution in Europe - especially in Switzerland, where they’re very keen on tradition.  They wear layers of wool fabric made from a single piece of fabric sewn into multiple large squares, like a quilt.  These are called knickers.  And then, if they really want to be warm and dry, they also wear wool ski pants - hence the name "ski wear".  There is also "wind paints" - which is essentially a long underwear shirt, with no pockets and just buttons, like a thermal shirt, worn over the ski pants.  It’s warm, it’s comfortable, and it looks like a huge, baggy vest.

Can I make my own garden fertilizer from food scraps?

Sure, but it can take a little experimenting to get the right balance of ingredients to make compost, and you have to use enough to get the process started and to build the microbial life in the soil that’s necessary to break down the waste. For example, you want to use “greens” for the first stage of the compost pile and “browns” for the second stage. So basically, you’ll want to layer green food scraps from things like lettuce, cauliflower, green apples, etc. in the first layer of your compost pile, then cover it with a layer of brown stuff, like dryer lint or dry leaves.  When you do this, a soil microbe called a “predatory mite” will make the first stage of the compost pile grow. This “predatory mite” feeds on the life in the soil and is the start of the decomposition of the food waste. In order for your compost to turn into actual “soil” with all the nutrients in it that you want, you need to get to a second stage of composting with the “browns” where bacteria, fungi, and other microbes are present in the soil.

What is ozone?

Ozone is a gas that’s also known as O3, and it’s made up of three oxygen atoms instead of the usual two, and in some special chemical states it’s also very reactive.  A lot of molecules and organisms and things are very sensitive to ozone.  For example, some people have some skin types that are sensitive to sunlight, but also sensitive to ozone, which is why skin cancer sometimes seems to go away when there’s more ozone in the air.  Other molecules that are in the air are mostly not affected by ozone, like nitrogen and oxygen and carbon dioxide, but even those molecules are a bit more active in the presence of ozone.  And there are other chemical species in the air that are sensitive to ozone and less sensitive to other molecules, and their behavior can be influenced by the presence of ozone.

Ingredients

50 g ground pork

3 teaspoons sesame oil

Preparation

What are other symptoms of menopause?

There can be many symptoms of menopause, and it can be difficult to be sure exactly what the cause is, because it is a time of many changes. Many women notice that they are more forgetful than they used to be, and other women notice that they’re sleeping worse and waking up more tired. Some women notice that their skin is drier, and their hair is also less lustrous. Some women’s feet may start swelling, and their breasts can feel tender and sore. Many women also notice mood changes, they can feel more anxious, and sometimes depressed, or feel less happy than they used to be. There are also physical changes that can sometimes affect the sex life, such as vaginal dryness and pain during sex.

The differences are most easily described with an analogy.  Suppose a virus is a person and a bacteria is a particle.  A virus can’t do anything on its own, it needs a host cell to provide it with a way to replicate and move around. What is an EIN?

An EIN, or Employer Identification Number, is a number that employers have to register.  It’s actually one part of a federal law called the E-Verify law, which was passed in the 1990s. 

It’s a complicated system, with many rules, but basically the idea is that when a US citizen hires a new employee, they have to ask the person whether they’ve ever been employed in a job where they might have hired illegal immigrants.  The employer can only then hire someone with an EIN if they’ve answered “yes” to that question.

How do I prepare for a natural childbirth?

Most women today have routine medical interventions before and during childbirth, like pitocin (the synthetic version of a chemical that the body naturally releases to induce contractions), epidurals (to deaden pain during labor), and episiotomies (to cut and widen the opening of the birth canal to make passage easier for the baby).  Many medical interventions are not needed and have associated risks (like episiotomy or forceps and vacuum extractors, which can tear the perineum and increase the risk of post-partum pain and infection). What are warning signs of mental illness?

The first warning sign is when a person believes that they are being persecuted or mistreated by an authority figure or society, even when the person is clearly experiencing a situation which appears to be untrue.  Second, mental illness can also be identified by people who have a feeling of helplessness or hopelessness, and wish to end their own life or the life of another.  Third, there are many of different types of mental illnesses, some of the most common are Bipolar Disorder, Schizophrenia, and depression.  For Bipolar Disorder, there is a serious need for people who are in a manic episode to be hospitalized, where they can be treated with medication.  For Schizophrenia, a person who is experiencing a psychosis can become violent and homicidal.  Depression can result in suicide, where a person may feel so hopeless that they wish to kill themselves.

What should I do if I see a bear?

It’s important to take the right steps in these situations.  The first thing to do is look around.  If there are any nearby structures or trees you can climb, go there.  If there are any other people around, approach them and ask for help.  The good news is that most bears don’t attack humans unless provoked.  To keep your distance, you can also yell and clap.  Keep an eye on the bear’s behavior.  If you see a bear approaching you, raise your hands and stand on a sturdy piece of ground.  If the bear still approaches you, yell as loud as you can and try to scare it off.  You should never run or crouch down and show your neck.  If you are attacked by a bear, do not play dead.  You need to show the bear you are still alive, for example by keeping your eyes open and talking, even if you have to whisper.  Your best chance of survival is to use a weapon that is easy to carry, such as a stick or a rock.

How do I patch up an air mattress?

It’s also possible that the leak in your mattress is actually caused by a pinhole in the mattress itself, which can happen if the air inside the mattress gets too hot or if it develops a bubble inside, which causes it to contract and eventually become damaged.  If you need to patch it up, you can try to “boot” it: this is where you get a big, rubber-tipped boot (such as one used for curing rubber in auto repair shops) and insert it in the side of the mattress, and then expand the mattress from the outside, letting it expand into the boot and sealing up the hole.

Just a simple recipe for deviled eggs.

For deviled eggs, the way I make them is I cut the yolk out of the egg, and season the yolk with salt and pepper and mustard and paprika and garlic powder. Then I take a small bowl of water and put some eggs in it. You let them sit for five minutes, until the white of the egg floats up and goes down.

Then I peel the egg and cut the white into strips. The next step is I fry the egg whites in olive oil for a couple minutes on each side, until they become crispy.

Once the egg whites are fried, I mix the deviled egg yolk with mayonnaise, as well as paprika, mustard, salt, garlic powder, and maybe some lemon juice. I then scoop that into the egg whites and serve. It’s delicious!

This is a deep question. I can tell you what I think, though. If people don’t feel that what they’re doing is meaningful, then they won’t see the value in the activities that help them do those things. You could be a person who puts all your value in material things, and you’ll want to have as many of them as possible, because you don’t know what else there is to do with your life. Or you could have a sense that you are doing something that has an impact on the world, like solving a social problem, or raising a child, or painting a beautiful picture, and you’ll have less need for material goods, because you have these other things that give you meaning. And in turn, it might make you very attached to some of your possessions, or certain possessions, because you really value what they give you. I think this might be true at the individual level, but it might also be true at the societal level. What is the best way to clean a laptop screen?

Some cleaners and other products will claim to clean the screen, but they may damage the screen. Here are some steps you can take to clean a screen that have been tested and are effective:

Dry off your screen with a soft cloth or with a clean cotton towel.

Do not use anything abrasive. You may have seen liquid cleaners, or wipes that claim to clean or refresh your laptop screen. These may leave scratches, causing you to think your screen is dirty and dirty again! If you try using these on your screen, you may damage your screen.

If you can, use a screen cleaner that is available at an office supply store. Avoid “solutions” that are advertised as a perfect cleaning solution or as “like a towel but 100 times better”.

Do not use a can of compressed air to clean the screen. Canned air is not an acceptable method for cleaning your screen. It may cause more damage to your screen by cleaning dust and debris.

Use the factory cleaners on your screen. Usually these are chemicals with a blue liquid inside a paper box. Make sure that it is made by your screen manufacturer and not a generic brand from the store. If your screen can be removed, gently clean it
What are some of the causes of heart disease?

Causes of heart disease range from lifestyle factors to medical conditions.  Tobacco smoke is a major contributor to heart disease, as are other types of smoking.  The consumption of a large amount of saturated fat (or "red meat" as it's often called) can lead to a higher risk of heart disease.  There's also a higher risk of heart disease in people with high blood pressure.  People with high blood pressure are also more likely to have a stroke or heart attack.  Other lifestyle factors also contribute to heart disease, including obesity, lack of exercise, high blood sugar, or diabetes.

That is pretty terrifying to think about. If it happens to someone, is it the doctor's fault?

If someone is fully anesthetized, they are not supposed to be conscious during the operation.  However, sometimes things happen that prevent them from being fully anesthetized.  So, in some cases the doctor's actions may make things worse for the patient.  In some cases, there is no clear reason why the doctor's actions made a difference.  But in other cases, they were negligent in some way.  There are many ways that the doctor's actions may not be enough to cause the patient to wake up, though.  In cases where this happens, it's the hospital's responsibility to make sure that the patient has been sufficiently anesthetized.  The surgeon is usually not responsible, since they are not the ones who give the anesthetic.  However, they do have the responsibility to tell the anesthetist what they are doing and so that the anesthetist knows what they will do in the case that the patient wakes up and is able to feel pain.  This is because the doctor is considered the one in charge of the operation, and so they are responsible for making sure the patient is adequately anesthetized.

Sorry, I wanted to know the details of their experience, to know if it’s different from the learning experiences they’re used to having.  So if they’re familiar with skis and you just want to teach them a new skill, the simplest approach would be to focus on their visual-motor coordination: telling them how to put their feet in the right place on the skis.  A less-direct approach would be to build on their existing skills:

Tell them that the ski boots have laces, and they need to put them in their ski boots, so they can walk on the snow.

Tell them they need to get up and move around, because skis are slow to turn.

Tell them to try pointing their skis, and using their poles, to keep their balance on the snow.  “When you point your skis, your feet should be in the direction you’re pointing.”

Tell them how to move their feet, from a pointing-the-skis to a sweeping-the-skis to a sliding-the-skis position.  Tell them how to stop using the poles.

You could also let them wear a helmet, and practice maneuvering with your hands behind your back, but you don’t want to waste time with that if the child is already an experienced skier.  Most beginning skiers will get confused about how to use the poles.

Do you know if there is much difference between cage-free eggs and regular ones? Why are the cage-free more expensive?

Cage-free eggs are a term for eggs produced by hens that are not kept in cages. The vast majority of eggs used in the US and most other countries are “caged” in large farms, which typically include tens of thousands of hens packed into a single building. Often, these hens are unable to stretch their wings or move around freely, and live in cages where they can’t even spread their wings and fly if they wanted to.  They also can’t see the sky, and most can’t even see each other. 

There is significant evidence that hens raised in cages have lower mental health and lower production of eggs. It is not unusual for a hen to live the majority of her life in a cage, and sometimes she lives in that cage for her entire life. While their are alternatives for cage-free hens in the US and elsewhere, such as cage-free range conditions, there is still not enough hens on these farms to satisfy the egg demand.

In order to find your body measurements, take a piece of string and measure each of your body parts with the string, following the following guidelines.

Head and Neck: Start at the base of your skull and go down to the tip of your nose.  Make sure to measure directly around your neck, over the place where you'd wear your collar.  I'd recommend going all the way down to the place on your neck where you'd wear your necktie.

Torso: Next measure your torso by wrapping the string around your torso, just above your belly button, and down past your hips.  Make sure to wrap the string all the way around and make sure the tape measure is straight.

Arms: Next measure the circumference of your arms at the top, and down past the elbow.  Start with the tape measure around your right arm.

Legs: To measure the circumference of your legs, use a tape measure around your thigh, just below your groin

Native American, or Indigenous tradition in the United States, sometimes focuses on the Buffalo as a sacred animal. I'm curious as to why, some themes about that?

Native Americans have been hunters for many centuries.  Prior to European colonization, they often practiced subsistence hunting on land.  They did this by slowly tracking an animal, and using a special strategy of driving the animal off a cliff in order to kill it and obtain the meat.  This method of hunting was sustainable because they were careful not to hunt too many animals in one place.  They didn’t want to decrease their food sources too much, or they might end up getting sick.  

The buffalo are considered one of the most important animals in the story of Native American heritage.  The buffalo also holds some very significant spiritual connections to the Native Americans, they held spiritual importance due to the big role it played in the Native American’s day to day life.  The buffalo were important to Native Americans because they used them for meat, fur, hide, tools, etc.  But they also helped to find water in the drier times of the year.  The buffalo is also a vital tool to help Native Americans when they use the buffalo to obtain beads and other forms of trade with other tribes.

2 cups granulated sugar
2 eggs
1 teaspoon vanilla extract

1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon salt
1 cup creamy peanut butter
1 cup chocolate chips

Sure! There are lots of similar preparations, all of which will feature some variations on the soup base: chicken, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Soto ayam is a clear chicken soup. Here’s a recipe you can use to make a version of it: Ingredients: 1 whole chicken breast 1 tablespoon chicken base 3 cups of chicken broth 2 tomatoes, diced 1/2 onion, diced 3/4 cup coconut milk (light or full fat) Salt to taste Instructions: 1. Chop the chicken into bite-sized pieces and put it into a large stockpot. 2. Add the chicken base and the chicken broth, and bring it to a boil. 3. While the stock is coming to a boil, dice the tomatoes. 4. Once the stock has reached a rolling boil, add the diced tomatoes and the diced onion. This mixture will make the “tomato stock” for the soup. 5. Once the tomato stock is boiling, add the coconut milk. The coconut milk will now be mixed in, but don’t worry, this is good! There is still more to add! 6. Add the diced chicken and stir gently so that all the chicken is submerged. Once the chicken is fully submerged, it is done! To make this into soto ayam, simply make a clear soup. Once it has reached a boil, add about 1/2 to 3/4 teaspoon of salt. This will give it a sweet and sour taste, which is typical. Add a bit more if you want to really make the soup taste salty, but I personally like to avoid this. Garnish

More than one child generally increases the risk of poverty, as well as the probability that there will be divorce in the family. It also used in the manufacturing process for many other kinds of plastic. “PFOA” stands for perfluorooctanoic acid, which is similar but contains one more oxygen atom in its molecular structure. It also used in the manufacture of many kinds of plastic. PFOS and PFOA are fairly persistent chemicals, and tend to build up in the environment, including in water supplies, as they are released into the environment and don’t readily break down. What are hybrid seeds?

An hybrid seed is a seed that came from a plant that was bred to produce desirable traits. This was mostly done by plant breeders who took two different plants, bred them together, and then saved the seeds from the resulting plants. This process was repeated until the desired plant traits were created. Sometimes plants have been bred for hybrids, like tomatoes and potatoes. In fact, hybrids are the seeds of most of the vegetables and fruits we grow.  There’s also a third kind of seed called an heirloom seed, which is just a seed from an old plant that has been passed down.

Hi, I'd like to begin keeping bees. Can you tell me all the things I'll need to do to accomplish this?

Sure! The first thing is to pick out the hive you'd like to get. You can either get a “killer” hive, or a “nucs” hive. A killer hive is a hive that's already started by somebody else, but it's not yet completely set up for being used by the new beekeeper, and there may be too many bees in there, or it may not be a good breed, or there might be too much of one type of bee. A nuc is a queen bee, a bunch of female worker bees and some frames of honey, usually from an existing hive. The nuc you pick out needs to be the right size and breed for the area you live in. In other words, the nuc needs to be the right size for the area you're in, so the queen will be able to produce the right amount of new bees for the area. Ingredients:


12 oz white sugar

12 oz all-purpose flour

12 oz butter, melted

6 eggs

2 tsp baking powder

1⁄4 tsp salt

2⁄3 cup milk

1 tsp vanilla

Preparation:

Can marijuana be addictive?

It's actually quite difficult to get addicted to marijuana, as it's non-habit-forming. One reason is that marijuana has a low euphoria value, meaning that when people use it, it's not actually really pleasant. Also, people are likely to have much stronger withdrawal symptoms from alcohol than from marijuana. Because of this, marijuana has very little reinforcing effect. So while it's possible to get addicted to other substances (e.g. opioids or tobacco), it's unlikely that marijuana is going to be one of them.

Spend more time with your friends and listen to what they’re saying.

Try to understand their feelings. If they’re feeling worried, ask them if they need help with anything. Ask them about what they’re doing, or what they’ve been up to.

This is the broth that will be used to make the risotto. Then, some bacon, lard, onions, celery, carrots, leeks, mushrooms, and garlic are sautéed in a separate pan. In the skillet where the meat has been sautéed, there are pork livers, the flavoring of the risotto. Then, tomatoes and anchovy paste are added. The Italian Wikipedia states that the most common method to add the risotto is to use “tomatoes and wine”; the addition of the risotto is made using chicken broth, and the “risotto” is stirred until it “is no longer runny.” It can be served with melted pecorino cheese.

Mindfulness meditation is really, really challenging! It’s more than just focusing your attention on the present moment, as you’re moving through the world, it’s about bringing into the present moment. This is why mindfulness is a practice that can really help you overcome addiction, because so often we get caught in the past or the future, and forget to enjoy the moment right now. Here are a few ways you can try mindfulness meditation out, some of which you can easily do now! - Try walking, or sitting, and noticing all the details of your body. The way your clothes touch your body. The air. The way you feel the ground. Try to notice your whole body, not just the parts that you want to pay attention to. Also, notice the details of your surroundings. Don’t focus on what’s really happening in the world, but pay attention to the sounds and movements in your immediate environment, and also your body and your mood. - When you notice that your mind has wandered off into the past or the future, try bringing it back to the present moment. Don’t be annoyed or hard on yourself. It happens, and it’s natural. But just notice, and gently bring your attention back to the here and now. - One more thing that you can do that’s a really simple but effective exercise is to do this: - Sit or stand with your hands in your pockets or by your sides. As the son of Daedalus and one of his workmates, Icarus is described as one of the most skilled craftsmen in Greece.  Although working alongside his father, he is said to have surpassed Daedalus in skill and ingenuity.  However, he grew so proud that he decided to flee the island of Crete where he lived with his father, and fly to the land of the Sun in order to see the results of his father’s work.  Daedalus had created wings for himself and Icarus so that they could escape Crete, but told Icarus to fly with caution.  The two young men took off, but when Icarus flew too close to the Sun, the wax holding the feathers together melted, and he tumbled to his death.  Daedalus was disconsolate at the death of his son, and continued to the land of the Sun, but not to escape as Icarus had done.  He went in order to honor his son and give him a proper funeral.

Now let’s say there’s someone who is running towards your car, and you’re going to run them over if you don’t move. What is the method of loci?

The method of loci is a technique for memorizing.  You first envision a place where you have a particular kind of object, and you repeat this mental image several times.  Then you remember the first letter of each object, which is the first letter of each word in the word you are memorizing.  Then you move on to a new place and do this with the second letter, and so on.  You also do this in memory, and in a different order each time.

250 g beef (cut into 1cm cubes)
2 onions (sliced)
3 cloves of garlic (finely chopped)
1 bunch of coriander (finely chopped)
3 medium tomatoes (sliced)
1-2 tbsp ghee

As a beginner, what are some easy things that I can make with origami?

When I was just starting origami I made a paper monkey by just folding a square of paper diagonally into a triangle shape.  You can also try making a plane by folding a piece of paper in half, with the long side towards you, then in half again, and in half again.  When you’re done, you should have a thin paper “plane” with the tips folded inward.  If you try that it should have a tail and wings, so it looks like a little plane.  Another fun thing to try is paper rosettes.  Make a circle by folding a piece of paper in half, with the long side towards you.  Then, starting on the outside edge of the circle, fold in half again, in a diagonal direction.  This gives you an “X” shape.  Now open the “X” and flatten it.  This is a rosette.  Try to make a series of rosettes around the circle, and a bunch of different sizes.

What do you mean by recycling percentage?

Basically, recycling means making something out of the thing you want to recycle, like for example if you wanted to recycle plastic into a bottle.  Recycling also means reusing a piece of plastic to make something, but not putting it in a bottle.  We call the total amount of material used to make a product the “material” usage, and we say “X% of the material is recyclable”, where X is the percentage.  If we start with 100 plastic bottles, and we turn them into 100 plastic bottles, then we can say that 100% of the material is recyclable.  But if we take those 100 plastic bottles, and we break the bottles up into bottle caps and bottle bodies, and we use those parts to make 10 plastic bottles, then only 10% of the material is recycled.

I have a problem with moths putting holes in the sweaters. How can I protect my wool from moths?

In the old days, moth-proofing was done by dusting the wool with starch or rice powder, or by washing the wool in a solution of boric acid or borax. But today, fabric-care labels recommend no special treatment. Moths can’t eat wool directly, so the main way they damage clothes is by getting their feet tangled up in the wool, which they then chew off to get free. Since the larvae eat the wool, they often damage the fabric when eating. So a wool sweater that was treated with borax or starch might still have holes, but it might also have ragged edges.

2 eggs, beaten

3 tablespoons of sugar

6 tablespoons of flour

1 1/2 teaspoons of baking powder

3/4 cup of milk

1 cup of fresh peaches

1/4 teaspoon of almond extract

Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.  Set aside a 9-inch baking pan.  Blend together egg, sugar, flour and baking powder until smooth.  Whisk together milk and almond extract and add to the other ingredients in the blender.  Pour the batter into the prepared pan.  Slice the peaches and lay them over the batter. Are cats nocturnal?

It depends.  Some cats are nocturnal, meaning they mostly sleep during the day and are active at night.  This is a pattern that shows up quite often in cats, both wild and domesticated.  Some cats are crepuscular, which means that they prefer to be active during twilight, just before and just after sunrise and sunset.  Then there are some cats that are called “anthropoid”, which means that they’re active during both the day and the night, so they don’t really have a set sleep schedule.  For example, most cats and many dogs spend their nights wandering around and doing things, then sleep during the day.  In humans, it’s the reverse, we spend our days doing things, and sleep at night.

Where did all that gas come from?

1.  Chemical pollution: if pollutants such as waste and chemicals are in the water supply, they can affect not only drinking water, but also the health of the soil.  The plants may die, and in turn, food crops may die as well.  This can lead to an imbalance of healthy animals and plants, and in turn, humans. 
2.  Plastic pollution: plastic containers can be used to hold water, and in this way, the water itself becomes polluted.
3.  Water logging: when there is so much water that it cannot all evaporate, it is considered water logging, which can be harmful to plants and soil.  It can also cause the soil to be eroded away.  It can also cause mosquito-borne diseases.
4.  Toxic waste: for some reason, humans often dump chemical waste in water supplies, which can have harmful effects on people.  As a side effect, it can also harm aquatic life.  If there is too much of it, there can be detrimental effects on plants and animals.

That’s a great question.  One issue that comes up with epistemic norms is that they often conflict with each other.  So to answer that question, let’s first check out the different epistemic norms.  One important norm is the norm of rationality, which says you’re a good epistemic agent if you don’t accept any beliefs that are against the available evidence.  Another is the norm of epistemic responsibility, which says you’re a good epistemic agent if you don’t accept any beliefs that aren’t justified in some way.  Yet another is the norm of curiosity, which says you’re a good epistemic agent if you don’t accept any beliefs that aren’t self-intuitively right. Halloween was a few weeks ago and I'm curious, can you tell me about the origins of the Halloween holiday?

Halloween is the day before November 1st, which is the day before All Saints Day. In the past, All Saints Day was when people remembered their ancestors and showed gratitude to them. So it was a time of remembrance, when people thought about their past. Halloween was later developed as a night for kids and families to have fun. They decorated their houses, and dressed up in costumes, and went out to have fun and trick or treat for treats. These practices are fun, and are still common today. But the dark things about Halloween have developed alongside the fun. Some of these include witches, Halloween masks, ghosts, and monsters. These things might scare or distress some people, especially young children. These things are not typically seen in mainstream culture today, but it’s important to be aware that they do exist. They also happen in the context of Halloween.

What is the difference between beta-blockers and ACE-inhibitors?

Beta-blockers reduce blood pressure by blocking the beta-adrenergic receptors in the heart and arteries. They also prevent the release of adrenaline, which is one of the hormones that make blood vessels narrow. When the receptor is blocked, it prevents the adrenaline from causing the constriction of blood vessels and thus lowers blood pressure. Beta-blockers also act to stimulate the heart to beat slower and with less force, which reduces the amount of work that the heart has to do to pump the blood. They also act to increase the amount of potassium that the kidneys filter out of the bloodstream and excrete in the urine.

ACE-inhibitors prevent the production of ACE, an enzyme that constricts blood vessels, and thereby blocks the effects of adrenaline and raises the blood pressure. Unlike beta-blockers, ACE-inhibitors do not cause the heart to beat slower or produce more potassium in the urine. These drugs act by interfering with the constriction of the blood vessels and reducing the workload of the heart, thereby lowering blood pressure.

Okay can you explain how the concept of lift?

Sure!  The lift of a helicopter is what allows it to hover in the air with no engine or other power source.  If you drop a ball and hold it over your head, you will feel the gravity pushing down, so you have to push down with your hand to keep the ball in the air.  A helicopter has the same feeling, except the feeling is coming from below you, and there’s no need to push against the earth!  In fact, when a helicopter is hovering it uses the earth itself to push itself up.  How does it do this?  It’s actually an interesting question that gets into some of the details of physics that a lot of people can get wrong!  In very simple terms, the earth is actually constantly generating a constant force in the direction of the local gravity, and when we combine this with the air pressure, we get a large force pushing up at a really high speed.  A helicopter rides on top of the air pressure, which is pushing up at the same speed, so there is a feeling of lift as the helicopter sits up there.

Can you help me to understand how Howard Florey was able to first discover and use penicillin?

Oh sure, I can explain that! The first antibiotic medicines were discovered in the 1880s, when doctors noticed that people who were sick with serious infections got better when they were exposed to a mold called Penicillium chrysogenum. This was actually a coincidence; the doctors didn’t realize that this substance was related to disease, they just noticed that the person getting better was also near the mold. That was before scientists knew what microbes were, so this was the first clue to their existence. It wasn’t until the 1940s that Dr. Florey first used penicillin to treat patients. In those days, penicillin was quite difficult to make in sufficient amounts, so Dr. Florey didn’t have any interest in developing it. Then in 1943, while Dr. Florey was a prisoner of war, another scientist named Howard Walter Florey was examining another mold called Streptomyces griseus, which he had previously discovered to be related to drug-producing molds. In his experiments, he accidentally contaminated a plate of culture, but kept the petri dish anyway because he was curious what it would do. He found that the contaminated culture produced a substance that was quite useful for killing bacteria, and he sent a sample to Dr. Florey in order to find out whether they could be used to treat patients. Dr. Florey tested the substances, and found that they were effective for treating various infections.

One thing you can do, as a future spelunker, is to learn some key cave safety principles.  Let’s look at a couple of them now:


1.  Never allow someone to guide you through an unfamiliar cave by just a rope.  Make sure you can see them, and they can see you.
2.  Do not attempt to spelunk with another person unless you can see them, and they can see you.
3.  Never try to explore with a child if you have not done so with an adult.
4.  If you have to wear a helmet, make sure it’s rated to prevent rocks and debris from entering your skull.
5.  Never climb past the ends of your ladders.  Climbing above the ends of the ladders is almost always dangerous, and can even cause a rock fall.
6.  If the floor of the cave gets muddy, or wet, do not walk on it.  Instead, walk along the walls and wait for the mud to dry.
7.  Never feed the animals or use your food as a weapon.  Always wear long sleeves and long pants, so they will catch any bites from animals.

Should you use fabric softener in the laundry?

I’m glad you asked! For many years, fabric softener was thought to be helpful in removing static, and improve the feel of clothes. However, the field has been advancing in recent years and many researchers are now investigating the long-term effects of softening clothing. You can find a fairly comprehensive review of these effects here. In short, it appears that these benefits are not significant enough to be worthwhile in all circumstances. Can you explain the main parts of the screenplay?

Each part of a screenplay has a name, but they can also be explained in terms of what they do.  The outline is the skeleton of the script, and it’s typically 4-6 pages in length.  The outline can also include notes and guidelines about where the script should go, and sometimes also about certain technical terms.  The loglines are the part of the screenplay that summarizes what happens in each scene.  They’re typically 1-2 pages in length and cover 2-3 scenes, and they’re the part of the script that shows what happens in the scenes.  I wouldn’t recommend trying to write a logline about a scene without first sketching out a scene-by-scene outline.

The acts of the screenplay are usually written from point-of-view, but they can also be written in third-person omniscient.  The acts are typically longer than the scenes, and each one begins with a description of what the scene looks like, and then gives some context about the main character in the scene, and then some of the main dramatic action that happens in the scene.

But people often come back to this piece over and over again, as they always seem to find something new in it. It is much less piano-oriented than his other “miniatures”, and more of a vocal-instrumental piece. The Song of the Night is another “miniature”, but again it’s unlike the others in that it doesn’t really have a “character” or “voice” to it. People often listen to this piece as they go to bed at night, as it seems to have a way of creating a soothing and calming atmosphere. It has a very basic character that doesn’t change, but the melody does seem to change at a much deeper level as it progresses. It starts with the piece being slow and hushed, and grows slightly faster as it progresses, but still very slowly. It eventually gets slower again, then stops completely, which is rare for a piece with such an ending. Night Music is another “miniature” for piano that is very unusual for Bartok. Can you explain what it means to be a Free Agent in Major League Baseball?

Sure. There are four classes of Major League Baseball free agents, based on a player’s age and experience level, so there are four groups. We can divide them into four categories:

An unrestricted free agent is someone who is not under contract with any other team.

A Type-A free agent is a player who has been on the team’s roster for at least six years and has at least 10 years of service time. They have the highest compensation rights, which means their new team has to give them at least as much in compensation as they would have had if they had been a Type-A free agent the previous year. A team can only sign one Type-A free agent, and the one they sign gets to receive the Type-A bonus. 

A Type-B free agent is a player who has been on the team’s roster for at least four years, with at least two years of service time, and is at least 26 years old and has at least three years of Major League service. Type-B free agents are still valuable players, but they don’t have the same compensation rights. A team can sign as many Type-B free agents as they want, and the free agents will share compensation,

I've heard about the Opium War a lot but don't know much about it. Can you summarize what happened?

Sure, the Opium War was one of the first modern wars of the modern era, fought between the Qing Dynasty of China and the British Empire in 1839. The British forced the Chinese to open their ports to trade, which allowed Westerners to sell opium to the Chinese for cheap. The British also insisted the Chinese give them free access to trade and that they accept foreign diplomats.

The Qing Dynasty disagreed with these conditions, so in retaliation they used their military forces to seize and destroy all British and French trade goods in Canton. The British responded by invading in June 1839, seizing Hong Kong. The Chinese agreed to trade under the conditions the British wanted in order to return Hong Kong, but the British were only going to return it if they got more trade concessions. The Qing dynasty and the British went back and forth like this for a while, but finally the Chinese agreed to sign the Treaty of Nanking in 1842.  The Treaty gave Britain Hong Kong in exchange for their dropping the demand for trade concessions, and allowed foreign warships in Chinese ports.

Original quinine is found in the bark of the cinchona tree but you said that the modern version of quinine is chemically produced?  Why would pharmaceutical  companies do that since, I am sure. quinine can still be found in the bark cinchona trees?

Yes, quinine was extracted from bark of the cinchona tree for thousands of years, and it can still be extracted from the bark. But in the 1890s, chemists at the German company BASF began looking into other ways to extract quinine. They found that the compound can be extracted by creating organic compounds from inorganic compounds and then adding an organic compound to the mix, for example adding acetone to form the quinine compound.  They also found that this process can be done at high volumes, and can be stored and transported much more easily than the natural product.  The problem with the natural product is that it has to be extracted by taking huge amounts of the bark of the cinchona tree and is very labor intensive.   The artificial compounds are much easier to make, and the process allows them to be produced in much larger quantities.  This is a typical process known as synthetic production.

So it sounds like a movie needs multiple producers. Is that what the difference in titles means? For example, executive producer, producer, et cetera?

Yes, exactly.  There are a lot of different titles for producers, and a lot of different levels of production that are needed to make a movie.  Here are a couple examples, and their titles:  The person who raises the funds to make the movie is called the “executive producer”, or “EP”. The person who finds the actors, sets up the locations, coordinates the shooting, and keeps track of the film crew is called a “line producer”. The person who chooses the people who will be on the film crew and who makes sure they get the resources they need is called a “producer” or “unit production manager”. The person who coordinates the budgets, and manages the resources to make sure that the movie is made is called “production coordinator”.  And of course there are more people on a film crew who have to be “coordinated” and they have different titles, like the “director of photography” or “art director”.  Here are a couple more titles you may have heard of:  “film director”, “cinematographer”, “visual effects artist”, “visual effects supervisor”.

Why do they believe they should not receive blood infusions?

The Jehovah's Witnesses have a strict set of beliefs regarding blood, because it was a subject that is mentioned specifically in the Bible.  The first book of the Bible, Genesis, states that God created humans after his image, and that this was something that no other creature could replicate.  So God’s instructions, to all humans, were that they could not eat any flesh with blood.  Humans could only eat plants, fish, or animals with the blood drained from them.  One of the Jehovah’s Witnesses beliefs is that the soul does not leave the body at death, and is instead sealed by the blood.  They believe this because Christ was “pierced for our transgressions” and was “sprinkled with his own blood”, which they believe was symbolic of the fact that he was carrying all of our sins as he hung on the cross.  When God created mankind, he told them that it was forbidden to consume blood or they would be disobeying him, and in turn God would be disgusted by them.

People got cowpox? How? From the vaccines?

Right, it’s called an “immunization.” So some people, who had never had smallpox, were deliberately exposed to the cowpox virus to create immunity. This was called a “controlled exposure.”   Then when a patient came down with smallpox, doctors could also inject them with the cowpox virus, so that their bodies would create antibodies that could fight the disease. This would make them immune to smallpox.   It was a tricky process, but now we have a much better understanding of how the immune system works, and so we can protect people from infectious diseases very safely and effectively.  
Vaccines are also extremely important today, as they protect people from many diseases. And we have much better science and technology now. We don’t have to rely on controlled exposure.

Paint-fumes can also cause cancer, but that is a long-term thing, so it is unlikely you'll get cancer from sniffing paint. My feeling is that if you want to be as nice as possible to Santa, and you’re also trying to avoid tempting bad behavior by the kids, you should leave some cookies out.  But I don’t think it’s a good idea to leave cookies out as an automatic “always” situation.  When you really care about the kids, and you want to be careful with how they’re raised, leaving cookies out is a nice gesture but also an easy trigger for bad behavior.  Kids who are used to having the house filled with cookies for Santa are less likely to have a “bad” reaction to receiving cookies, because they’re more “used to it”.  This is not to say you should never leave out cookies, but it’s good to put a little thought into when and where you’d do it.

Can I get enough Vitamin D from the sun alone? Or should I take a vitamin too?

The main reason it’s difficult to get enough vitamin D from sun exposure is that it’s limited to summertime in most places, and the sun is too far away during the rest of the year.  As you may have heard, people in sunnier, southern places have lower rates of Vitamin D deficiency.  Ideally, there’s a lot of vitamin D-enriched food available to you that’s less expensive and easier to get than vitamin supplements.  There’s also some research suggesting that sunshine will also help your body produce Vitamin D more effectively, but there are lots of other possible benefits of sunlight, like vitamin C production, and boosting of mood.  Some people do choose to get dietary supplements, but you should probably only do this if you’re eating plenty of foods that are naturally rich in Vitamin D.

I have never heard of any Asians being called "Mongol"!

Yes, most people know that the Mongol Empire was located in what is now modern-day Mongolia. But they don’t know that the Mongol Empire is also the origin of the name "Mongol" for many Asian populations. As the Mongol Empire expanded into Central Asia, it encountered a number of Turkic ethnic groups, such as the Yü-Ts’ai tribe, who would later become the Chaghatai Khanate. The Yü-Ts’ai were the first to call the Mongols "Mongol." The Chaghatai Khanate later conquered much of Western China, where they ruled as the Yüan Dynasty from 1260 to 1368. Because the Chaghatai Khanate’s ruling dynasty was the Yüan Dynasty, which was populated with people of the Yü-Ts’ai ethnic group, this name was later used to refer to Chinese people of Mongol ancestry, including the Manchu ethnic group who conquered the Ming Dynasty in China. Thus, the name "Mongol" has also come to refer to people of Asian ethnic groups.

If you want to store clothes you've bought or borrowed for short term use, it would be easiest to just put them in a bag or box or other container, and stack them on a shelf.  You'd organize them by whatever was meaningful to you, and wouldn't need to be consistent with any official system.  But if you're trying to make your closet last a long time, or if you have a lot of clothes that you want to always find, it's important to have a system that makes them easy to find.  An appropriate system would be something like this:

* Fold shirts and pants with fold-over collars inside out.  (Remember to keep them facing the same way so you can tell which ones are right side out.)  You can fold other items as you like, but it's good to keep them symmetrical.

* Put underpants, socks, and similar things in a separate drawer or basket, since they don't take up much space and the fabrics are not suitable for hanging.  If you store them in a bag, make sure they don't overlap and you can get to them easily.

Alright, I can give you some suggested names and a description of their artwork.  The painter Vincent Van Gogh was an important artist in the late 1800s, who focused on what we call “Expressionist” art.  He believed that the artist should reflect their feelings in their art, rather than trying to describe them.  That means that there will often be very high emotion or intensity in his paintings.  And an interesting result of this is that some people don’t really like Van Gogh’s paintings.  For instance, when you Google his painting The Starry Night, you’ll see lots of people sharing photos of it on social media saying things like “I hate this painting” and “It’s gross.”  Other people find the high emotion of the painting intriguing or refreshing, and enjoy it.  So when thinking about a Van Gogh painting, keep in mind that he might have painted something you find exciting, but other people might find it upsetting. But I’m sure you have heard stories about how one family pet was in the yard with another family pet, and then suddenly their relationship changed for the worse. Well, the truth is that this will not necessarily happen with you and your cat, but a realistic answer is that cats can certainly be territorial and have nasty behavior if their social space is infringed upon, even by something they’re normally friendly toward. So I would just keep an eye on the interactions and if there is any danger, you should act on it and keep your cat and rabbit separated.  

In terms of why you want to get a rabbit, there is no reason to not get a rabbit, but you should be aware that rabbits are energetic animals, they need to run around and jump, and your cat may not necessarily be happy with that. The starting position of the dumbbell fly is with your arms and wrists fully extended, with the elbows slightly bent. This allows the biceps to contract and stretch at the top of the exercise, rather than just at the bottom. You can have your arms fully extended or a little lower if it helps to have a wider range of motion.  The weights are moved in opposite directions, in a slow, controlled motion.

How exactly would it destroy the country?

It depends on how much material is ejected by the eruption, and how far it’s thrown.   In some cases, huge amounts of material might be hurled out of the volcano with enough velocity that it would leave the atmosphere and travel all the way to outer space.  For example, one possible case would be that enough material would be ejected that it would impact the atmosphere of the moon.  Then there’s a chance that the moon would get ejected into space, or just get sent careening off-course into deep space.  If enough material is ejected in such a way that it flies past the moon, there’s a chance that the debris could then impact other planets in the solar system, like Mars.
